actions.Multiattack: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.
actions.Greatclub: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Rock: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17+1d6 + 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
